widget.name: Falling Tire
widget.description: Description: Easy to play, Falling Tire has everything that a game needs! Falling Tire tests players' ability to map out paths, while keeping the flow of addictivity. With ten action packed levels, Falling Tire will keep you going for hours! The rule is extremely simple: use the blocks to create a simple pathway for the ball to Falling Tire into the box. Easy peasy! iOS compatibility coming soon! Supported By: Android, Symbian, Windows Phone OS
widget.author: AppSource
